2.1 #Molecules - Panel Panel

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

While not always necessary, sometimes you need to put your DOM in a box. For those situations, try the panel component.

.m-panel - By default, all the panel does is apply some basic border and padding to contain some content.

Example
Basic panel example
Markup: m-panel.html 
<div class="m-panel panel panel-default">
  <div class="panel-body">
    Basic panel example
  </div>
</div>
Source: src/scss/components/_m-panel.scss, line 1

2.1.1 #Molecules - Panel - With Heading Panel with heading

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Easily add a heading container to your panel with .panel-heading. You may also include any <h1>-<h6> with a .panel-title class to add a pre-styled heading. However, the font sizes of <h1>-<h6> are overridden by .panel-heading.

For proper link coloring, be sure to place links in headings within .panel-title.

.m-panel-default - By default, all the panel does is apply some basic border and padding to contain some content.

Example
Panel heading without title
Panel content

Panel title

Panel content
Markup 
<div class="m-panel panel-default">
  <div class="panel-heading">Panel heading without title</div>
  <div class="panel-body">
    Panel content
  </div>
</div>
<div class="m-panel panel-default">
  <div class="panel-heading">
    <h3 class="panel-title">Panel title</h3>
  </div>
  <div class="panel-body">
    Panel content
  </div>
</div>
Source: src/scss/components/_m-panel.scss, line 17

2.1.2 #Molecules - Panel - Contextual alternatives Contextual alternatives

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Like other components, easily make a panel more meaningful to a particular context by adding any of the contextual state classes.

Examples
Default styling

Panel title

Panel content
.panel-success
Success

Panel title

Panel content
.panel-info
Info

Panel title

Panel content
.panel-warning
Warning

Panel title

Panel content
.panel-danger
Danger

Panel title

Panel content
Markup 
<div class="m-panel [modifier class]"> <div class="panel-heading"> <h3 class="panel-title">Panel title</h3> </div> <div class="panel-body"> Panel content </div> </div>
